title: Did Bill Barr’s Father ‘Mentor’ Jeffrey Epstein and Write a ‘Bizarre’ Novel?
subtitle: A meme implied a nefarious link between financier and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Barr, father of U.S. Attorney General Bill Barr.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Donald Barr, father of U.S. Attorney General Bill Barr, hired Jeffrey Epstein as a teacher, served as his mentor, and wrote a novel about men raping teenage girls.
